body:
### Steps to reproduce

The following spec should be possible:
```
$ spack spec magma cuda_arch=75 %gcc@10.3.0 ^cuda@11.0.3
Input spec
--------------------------------
magma%gcc@10.3.0 cuda_arch=75
    ^cuda@11.0.3

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> The following constraints are unsatisfiable:
  allow_compiler("gcc","10.3.0")
  compiler_supports_os("gcc","10.3.0","centos7")
  compiler_supports_os("gcc","4.8.5","centos7")
  compiler_supports_os("gcc","7.3.0","centos7")
  compiler_supports_target("gcc","10.3.0","broadwell")
  compiler_supports_target("gcc","10.3.0","bulldozer")

...

  virtual("java")
  virtual("jpeg")
  virtual("lapack")
  virtual("mpi")
  virtual("pbs")
  virtual("pkgconfig")
  virtual("szip")
  virtual("uuid")
  virtual("xxd")
  virtual("yacc")
==> Error: magma%gcc@10.3.0 cuda_arch=75 ^cuda@11.0.3 does not satisfy unknown
```

### Error message

_No response_

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.2-4339-24500d4
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-zen2
* **Concretizer:** clingo

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: Clingo can't concretize magma ^cuda@11.0.3
